table.name: vtiger_ctchatlog
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ctchatlog` ( `ctchatlogid` int(11) NOT NULL, `chat_log_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `chat_type_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `platform_unique_id` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sender_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `conversation_id` longtext, `message_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `message_body` longtext, `type` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `api_request` longtext, `api_response` longtext, `module_record_id` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `message_datetime` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `message_important` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `sender_id` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sender_profile_pic_url` longtext, `chat_task_id` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `message_read_unread` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `fb_quoted_message` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`ctchatlogid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_ctchatlogcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ctchatlogcf` ( `ctchatlogid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ctchatlogid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: ct_chat_license_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `ct_chat_license_settings` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `license_key` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, `domain` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `apikey` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `user_type` enum('free','premium') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'free', PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: ct_chat_chattype
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `ct_chat_chattype` ( `chat_type_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `platform` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `modified_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `date_created` datetime NOT NULL, `date_modified` datetime NOT NULL, `active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (chat_type_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: ct_chat_facebook_messenger_page_configuration
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `ct_chat_facebook_messenger_page_configuration` ( `facebook_messenger_config_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `chat_type_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `facebook_page_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `allow_users_groups` longtext NOT NULL, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `modified_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `date_created` datetime NOT NULL, `date_modified` datetime NOT NULL, `active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (facebook_messenger_config_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: ct_chat_field_mapping
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `ct_chat_field_mapping` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `chat_type_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `field` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `modified_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `date_created` datetime NOT NULL, `date_modified` datetime NOT NULL, `active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: ct_chat_general_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `ct_chat_general_settings` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `chat_type_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `fieldname_value` longtext NOT NULL, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `modified_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `date_created` datetime NOT NULL, `date_modified` datetime NOT NULL, `active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: ct_chat_sync_facebook_pages
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `ct_chat_sync_facebook_pages` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `chat_type_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `facebook_pages` longtext NOT NULL, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `modified_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `date_created` datetime NOT NULL, `date_modified` datetime NOT NULL, `active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: ct_chat_token
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `ct_chat_token` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `chat_type_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `access_token` longtext NOT NULL, `username` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `modified_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `date_created` datetime NOT NULL, `date_modified` datetime NOT NULL, `active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `expires_in` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
